item.title: US-2 West at BL-15/MT-67
item.description: US-2 west at BL-15/MT-67 north to Lethbridge and the Shelby Airport. The I-15 shield is incorrectly displayed on this overhead as I-15.

item.title: US-2 West/BL-15 South - Shelby
item.description: BL-15/US-2 west shields in Shelby. Tank cars on the the Burlington Northern/Santa Fe Line are to the right.
